data.title: Learn This: Switch Flip - Chun Chai | Skate | VANS
data.description:
This year, Vans Sk85ive2 celebrates its 4th year running as a hub for Hong Kong skateboarding. Vans Sk85ive2 is a free-entry indoor skate park, fully air conditioned for those insane summer days and HK's notorious typhoons. Located on the 7th floor of an industrial building in the East of Kowloon, Vans Sk85ive2 is one of a kind. Check out local Hong Kong rider Luk Chun Yin AKA Chun Chai rip the Vans Sk85ive2 park, bringing you a glimpse of skateboarding from Hong Kong as our riders show you their favorite tricks for you to get hyped on and learn. This episode, Chun Chai demonstrates how to Switch Flip, a simple but elusive trick to most.

About Vans:
Vans®, a VF Corporation (NYSE: VFC) brand, is the original action sports footwear, apparel and accessories brand. Vans authentic collections are sold globally in more than 75 countries through a network of subsidiaries, distributors and international offices. Vans also owns and operates more than 450 retail locations around the world. The Vans brand promotes the action sports lifestyle, youth culture and creative self-expression through the support of athletes, musicians and artists and through progressive events and platforms such as the Vans Triple Crown of Surfing®, the Vans U.S. Open of Surfing, Vans Pool Party, Vans Custom Culture, Vans Warped Tour®, and Vans’ cultural hub and international music venue, the House of Vans.

Vans Top Athletes: 
Anthony Van Engelen, Geoff Rowley, Kyle Walker, Chima Ferguson, Gilbert Crockett, Tony Trujillo, Joel Tudor, Leila Hurst, Nathan Fletcher, Dane Gudauskas, Tanner Gudauskas, Patrick Gudauskas, Dakota Roche, Scotty Cranmer

data.title: Yura Chemodurov - Kamchatka | Snow | Vans
data.description:
Yura Chemodurov is a Russian snowboarder born and raised in the Sakhalin – a remote Russian island on the Pacific Far East – just North of Hokkaido Japan.  All shots in this FullPart were filmed in Kamchatka during 2014 and 2015 spring sessions for “The Turn” a Russian movie project. "It was a great team experience everyday in search of new spots, digging snow, stomping tricks and enjoying the awesome views around – famous mountain terrain, volcanos, forest and the ocean," says the Russian all around rider. Yura is a man of many talents. He is also the drummer on this soundtrack!

Music: Red Cats – Ula-La

About Vans:

Vans also owns and operates more than 450 retail locations around the world. The Vans brand promotes the action sports lifestyle, youth culture and creative self-expression through the support of athletes, musicians and artists and through progressive events and platforms such as the Vans Triple Crown of Surfing®, the Vans U.S. Open of Surfing, Vans Pool Party, Vans Custom Culture, Vans Warped Tour®, and Vans’ cultural hub and international music venue, the House of Vans.

data.title: Flo Marfaing Edit | Skate | VANS
data.description:
It’s been 13 years since the LORDZ crew shocked the world with the video They Don’t Give A Fuck About Us and Flo Marfaing hasn’t slowed down one bit. After dropping two full parts already this year we decided to chop them up and give you the RE-MIX edit featuring some of the highlights from both parts. 

Known as one of Europe's most technical street skaters, Vans team rider Flo Marfaing is still creating new and impressive tricks and skating hard everyday.

Filmed by: Paco
Edited by: Rich Smith
Music: Jon Kennedy

About Vans:
Vans®, a VF Corporation (NYSE: VFC) brand, is the original action sports footwear, apparel and accessories brand. data.title: The Story of Vans: Teaser | 50th Anniversary | VANS
data.description:
On March 16th, 2016 Vans will launch the Story of Vans, celebrating 50 years of milestones. Watch the animated story following the milestones in the brand’s origins in action sports, art, music and fashion.

data.title: Flex Control System | Fashion | VANS
data.description:
Flex Control System: Removable tongue stiffeners allow riders to custom-tune their boot flex. 
Slide them both in for maximum support and response, use just one to provide either increased response to the inside or outside of the boot or leave them out for a softer flexing more forgiving ride. 
Over the course of the season, as your boots break in and soften up, you can add the tongue stiffeners back in, extending the life of your boots. 
The Flex Control System is featured on the men’s Infuse and Sequal boots.

Music: "Midnight Summer Scheme" by Zac Marben

About Vans:
Vans®, a VF Corporation (NYSE: VFC) brand, is the original action sports footwear, apparel and accessories brand. Vans also owns and operates more than 450 retail locations around the world. The Vans brand promotes the action sports lifestyle, youth culture and creative self-expression through the support of athletes, musicians and artists and through progressive events and platforms such as the Vans Triple Crown of Surfing®, the Vans U.S. Open of Surfing, Vans Pool Party, Vans Custom Culture, Vans Warped Tour®, and Vans’ cultural hub and international music venue, the House of Vans.

data.title: Hybrid Closure System | Fashion | VANS
data.description:
Vans Hybrid Boa System: Featured on the men’s Infuse and Implant, the Hybrid Boa configuration represents the best of both worlds, combining traditional laces with Boa closure focused on the critical instep area of the boot. 
This configuration allows riders to lace their boots tighter than what can be achieved with traditional laces, as well as make on-the-fly adjustments. 
The Custom Slide Guide enables further customization of the fit and flex of the boot. 

Music: "Midnight Summer Scheme" by Zac Marben

data.title: Infuse Snowboard Boot | Fashion | VANS
data.description:
Infuse: The Infuse features the Vans Hybrid Boa Lacing System, Adjustable Flex Control & a heat moldable Custom X Liner which all allow you to tune the boot to your own personal specifications making this the most customizable snowboard boot available. 
We designed the Infuse for the rider who is looking for equipment that can adapt to any terrain and for those who demand the very best in performance functionality.

Music: "Midnight Summer Scheme" by Zac Marben

data.title: Vans Hi-Standard Snowboard Boot | Fashion | VANS
data.description:
Hi-Standard: A long standing reputation built on the look and feel of your favorite skate shoe and equipped with podium worthy performance features is just part of what has put the Hi-Standard in a class of it’s own for nearly two decades. 
All day lightweight custom fit comfort and a forgiving flex allow your board to become a natural extension of your body so you can forget about your boots and just enjoy the ride.

Music: "Midnight Summer Scheme" by Zac Marben

data.title: Encore Snowboard Boot | Fashion | VANS
data.description:
Encore: With classic styling, a slim profile and featuring all the benefits of the Boa Lacing System it is no surprise the Encore is one of the best selling Boa boots of all time. 
Clean lines on the outside give way to ultimate fit and comfort on the inside courtesy of the heat moldable Ultracush liner and footbed which will keep you shredding in style and comfort from first chair to last.

Music: "Midnight Summer Scheme" by Zac Marben

data.title: Vans Aura Snowboard Boot | Fashion | VANS
data.description:
Aura: The Aura combines a clean and classic aesthetic with advanced features giving you the ultimate blend of style and performance. 
The Aura features adjustable zonal closure with a custom slide guide that allows the rider to tune the direction of pull in the instep area to their own desired preference. 
All of this wrapped up in a lightweight low profile silhouette providing that classic skate shoe look and feel.

Music: "Midnight Summer Scheme" by Zac Marben

About Vans:
Vans®, a VF Corporation (NYSE: VFC) brand, is the original action sports footwear, apparel and accessories brand. Vans authentic collections are sold globally in more than 75 countries through a network of subsidiaries, distributors and international offices. Vans also owns and operates more than 450 retail locations around the world. The Vans brand promotes the action sports lifestyle, youth culture and creative self-expression through the support of athletes, musicians and artists and through progressive events and platforms such as the Vans Triple Crown of Surfing®, the Vans U.S. Open of Surfing, Vans Pool Party, Vans Custom Culture, Vans Warped Tour®, and Vans’ cultural hub and international music venue, the House of Vans.

asset.author: Vans

data.title: Reach Around Strap | Fashion | VANS
data.description:
Reach Around:
Much more than just a standard cuff strap. The Reach Around strap is attached to the inside shell of the boot and provides the versatility to wrap around either the internal liner or the exterior tongue of the shell allowing a rider to quickly and easily customize both the fit and response on their boot. Because the Reach Around strap is attached to the shell of the boot no movement is wasted and turning response is maximized. You’ll find the Reach Around System featured on the men’s Sequal, Implant & V-66 boots.

Music: "Midnight Summer Scheme" by Zac Marben

About Vans:

data.title: Vans Sequal Snowboard Boot | Fashion | VANS
data.description:
Sequal: Featuring Vans proprietary Adjustable Flex Control and the Reach Around Cuff Strap you can custom tune the support and response of the Sequal transforming it from forgiving cruiser to power steering performance. 
Don’t be fooled by the look of traditional lacing as the Sequal is also equipped with our Tongue Lock Down lacing system that seats your foot deeply into the liner eliminating heel lift and providing a performance fit that is far from traditional.

Music: "Midnight Summer Scheme" by Zac Marben

About Vans:
